ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: Monetary amount associated with the category.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate the information type of this adjudication record. Information types may include: the value submitted, maximum values or percentages allowed or payable under the plan, amounts that the patient is responsible for in-aggregate or pertainin

ivardefs.name: reason
ivardefs.desc: A code supporting the understanding of the adjudication result and explaining variance from expected amount.

ivardefs.name: value
ivardefs.desc: A non-monetary value associated with the category. Mutually exclusive to the amount element above.

properties.desc: If this item is a group then the values here are a summary of the adjudication of the detail items. If this item is a simple product or service then this is the result of the adjudication of this item.
